mdRecord.dcterms:description: land and church donated to the people of St. Augustine, Florida by American industrialist Henry Morrison Flagler, in exchange for the plot of land on which the congregation's original church stood. Original attached parsonage converted to classroom and office space, 1950s. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grace_United_Methodist_Church_(St._Augustine,_Florida) [work]
